EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Software: The Time for Digital Transformation is Now
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for stopping by the Pivotal booth at Structure Data 2016 in San Francisco! At Pivotal, our mission is to transform the way the world builds software. Central to that mission is being great at working with data using the right architecture and the right algorithms. Whether managing data, analyzing it or connecting insights with applications, we help our clients modernize their data architecture and harness the power of machine learning to drive their digital transformation.
We invite you to take advantage of our library of Big Data and Digital Transformation resources, including:
- Case Study: How O’Reilly Media Uses Pivotal Greenplum for Digital Publishing <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/case-study/enabling-rapid-analysis-of-huge-quantities-of-data-oreilly-media?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=text-link&utm_campaign=StructureConfQ116]]> - White Paper: Toward Actionable Information by IDC’s Dan Vesset <[[http://pivotal.io/transforming-business-results-with-big-data-and-analytics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=text-link&utm_campaign=StructureConfQ116]]> - On-Demand Webinar: Your Open Source Playbook for 2016 <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/your-open-source-playbook-for-2016?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium-text-link&utm_campaign=StructureConfQ116]]>
To participate in a live discussion about digital transformation, please join us in Las Vegas at SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=StructureConfQ116]]>, August 1–4.
SpringOne Platform brings together developers, operators, architects, data scientists and executives for in-depth, advanced, technical topics and accessible introductory content covering data analytics, machine learning, microservices, agile, continuous delivery, devops and more. Register today <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=StructureConfQ116]]>.
Now is the time to take the reins of your Digital Transformation. Let’s build something meaningful.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
